com.mathgame.cards

Class ImageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mathgame.cards.ImageGenerator

  • public class ImageGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImageGenerator class generates images for cards when given a mathematical expression. It is intended to support integers, decimals, fractions, exponents, and (in the future) logarithms
    Author:
    Roland Fong
